name: King Of The Pond (Hades_)
description:
Made in 72 hours for the 79th Mini Jam with the theme of frogs! The restriction was: One Level.

Begin life as just a small tadpole, and fight your way up the food chain in order to grow into the biggest frog you can! Dash around eating every thing you can fit in your mouth.

Controls - Hold left on your mouse to move, and right click to get a speed boost.
